description: The Dendro Archon and Lesser Lord Kusanali, Nahida is a powerful support and sub-DPS who excels at Dendro application and Elemental Mastery scaling.

stats.value: CRIT Rate / CRIT DMG / Elemental Mastery

info: Nahida is a Dendro support and sub-DPS who excels at off-field Dendro application and Elemental Mastery scaling. Build her for EM, Dendro DMG Bonus, and CRIT stats.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Akara
skills.desc: Performs up to 4 attacks that deal Dendro DMG.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 4 attacks that deal Dendro DMG.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to deal AoE Dendro DMG after a short casting time.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE Dendro DMG upon impact.

skills.name: All Schemes to Know
skills.desc: Nahida sends forth karmic bonds of wood and tree, marking enemies and linking them. Marked enemies take Dendro DMG when reactions are triggered.
skills.details_html:
All Schemes to Know
Marks enemies with the Seed of Skandha, linking them. When reactions are triggered, linked enemies take Dendro DMG.

skills.name: Illusory Heart
skills.desc: Nahida manifests the Court of Dreams, expanding a Shrine of Maya that boosts party members' EM and triggers additional effects based on team composition.
skills.details_html:
Illusory Heart
Expands the Shrine of Maya, boosting EM and providing additional effects based on team elements.

passive_talents.name: Compassion Illuminated
passive_talents.desc: When Nahida is in the Shrine of Maya, her Elemental Mastery is increased by 25% of the party member with the highest EM.

passive_talents.name: Awakening Elucidated
passive_talents.desc: Each point of Nahida's Elemental Mastery above 200 increases the DMG of All Schemes to Know and Tri-Karma Purification.

passive_talents.name: On All Things Meditated
passive_talents.desc: Nahida can harvest certain resources in Sumeru with a single tap.

constellations.name: The Seed of Stored Knowledge
constellations.desc: All Schemes to Know can mark 1 additional opponent.

constellations.name: The Root of All Fullness
constellations.desc: Opponents marked by Seeds of Skandha will be affected by increased CRIT Rate and DEF Shred.

constellations.name: The Shoot of Conscious Attainment
constellations.desc: Increases the level of All Schemes to Know by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Stem of Manifest Inference
constellations.desc: When Nahida triggers a Dendro reaction, all nearby party members gain increased Elemental Mastery.

constellations.name: The Leaves of Enlightening Speech
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Illusory Heart by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Fruit of Reason's Culmination
constellations.desc: When Nahida hits an opponent marked by Seeds of Skandha, the mark is removed and triggers a Tri-Karma Purification: Karmic Oblivion that deals massive Dendro DMG.
